suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: If you want to use AWS SQS as queue service.
suggest.iron-io/iron_mq: If you want to use Iron.io as queue service.
suggest.php-amqplib/php-amqplib: If you want to use RabbitMQ as queue service.
suggest.pda/pheanstalk: If you want to use Beanstalkd queue as service.
suggest.chrisboulton/php-resque: Install <= 1.2 if you want to use PHP Resque (Redis) as queue service.
